item.title: Spotify Secures Direct Licensing Deal With Kobalt
item.description: This partnership is a step in the right direction, and we look forward to continuing to work with Spotify to increase the value of songwriter royalties," Kobalt CEO Laurent Hubert said.

item.title: The Song of the Summer Is Dead
item.description: In an age of wavering consensus and widening divisions, music reflects the times more than ever. One factor missing from the discussion of this year’s song of the summer? The Donald Trump of it all.

item.title: What JD Vance, Pam Bondi, and Sam Altman Can’t Stop Listening To, According to the ‘Panama Playlists’
item.description: A new website claims to know the Spotify listening habits of Trump officials, tech leaders—and even journalists. Attorney General Pam Bondi allegedly jams out to Nelly’s “Hot in Herre."

item.title: For Songwriters to Earn a Living Wage, Spotify Must Step In
item.description: The same old rules that helped build Spotify’s empire are the ones still starving songwriters. But now Spotify can do something about it.

item.title: SiriusXM Launches Lower Cost Ad-Supported Plan in Bid to Take on Streaming Audio Giants
item.description: SiriusXM Play will cost under $7 and have an ad load that is about half of terrestrial radio stations.
